turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about List of films featuring giant monsters.
turn.1: What is Kaiju in relation to film?
turn.2: List of films featuring giant monsters This is an alphabetical list of films featuring giant monsters, known in Japan as kaiju.
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: One of the first films involving giant monsters was the 1933 classic "King Kong", as developments in cinema and animation enabled the creation of realistic giant creatures.
turn.5: What was the influence of this?
turn.6: The film influenced many giant-monster films in its wake, including many produced in Japan, starting with the adaptation "King Kong Appears in Edo" in 1938, which is now presumed to be a lost film.
turn.8: The visual effects in "King Kong", created by Willis O'Brien, inspired future monster film effects artists such as Ray Harryhausen and Dennis Muren.
turn.9: What were some of the early themes?
turn.10: Early giant-monster films often had themes of adventure and exploration of unknown regions, and incorporated fights with giant monsters as a climactic element.
turn.11: Did they have any other themes?
turn.12: The development of atomic weaponry in the 1940s gave rise to its involvement in popular themes.
